oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bump, Twist, Rock and Roll to Correct Uterine Torsions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Johnson, Craig A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: uterine torsion
technique
obstetrical cases
rolling technique
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: I would like to describe a simple technique for correcting uterine torsions. Each bovine practitioner easily recalls obstetrical cases involving uterine torsions that were a source of satisfaction and other cases that were not so satisfying. Dr. Herriott in "All Creatures Great and Small" described the traditional rolling technique on a Jersey cow belonging to his future father-in-law. His success was so satisfying that he felt comfortable asking the man ifhe could marry his daughter.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1993; 189
